name: High Roller Ingrown Hair Tonic with AHA and BHA
categories: Bath & Body, Bath & Shower, Scrub & Exfoliants
about: What it is:A lightweight serumu2014for your face, armpits, and bikini areau2014to soothe, calm, and comfort irritated skin, and discourage the formation of visible bumps from ingrown hairs..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dark Spots, Uneven Texture, and Acne and Blemishes.Formulation:Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients:- Salicylic Acid: Penetrates pores to target bump-causing buildup..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This dermatologist-tested serum exfoliates, comforts, and fades the look of discoloration and redness associated with ingrown hairs. It glides on with a hands-free rollerball, instantly delivering a cooling sensation that soothes feelings of discomfort due to razor burn.
ingredients: -Salicylic Acid: Penetrates pores to target bump-causing buildup..-Zinc PCA: Minimizes the appearance of skin irritation..-Glycolic Acid: Exfoliates to visibly refine uneven texture...Water/Aqua/Eau, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Glycolic Acid, Salicylic Acid, Zinc PCA, Niacinamide, Allantoin, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glycerin, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Phytonadione, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Butylene Glycol, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:. -Roll onto clean, dry, affected area.. - Can be used daily.. - May cause sun sensitivity. Use sunscreen and limit sun exposure while using this product.. - To help improve the signs of discoloration on the face or body, follow by either Faded Serum for Dark Spots & Discoloration or Faded Brightening & Clearing Mist.

PFB vanish has NOTHING and I mean NOTHING on High Roller. This product single handedly has prevented any ingrowns from forming, lifted the hyperpigmentation on both my underarms and pubic area.
